---
title: IPlistApi.plist_array_item_remove method
---

Remove a node that is a child node of a #PLIST_ARRAY node. node will be freed using #plist_free.

```csharp
public void plist_array_item_remove(PlistHandle node)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| node | The node to be removed from its #PLIST_ARRAY parent. |
